docs.title: France Travail API
docs.text:
A high-level Python SDK to interact with the France Travail API.

The SDK handles the OAuth2 Client Credentials Grant flow to authenticate with the API.

Get your API credentials (FRANCE_TRAVAIL_CLIENT_ID and FRANCE_TRAVAIL_CLIENT_SECRET) from the France Travail API developer portal and use them with the SDK :

from france_travail_api import FranceTravailClient, Scope

with FranceTravailClient(
    client_id="your_id",
    client_secret="your_secret",
    scopes=[Scope.OFFRES]
) as client:
    job_offers = client.offres.search(mots_cles="développeur Python")

docs.title: API
docs.text:
Client interface for the France Travail API.

This module provides the main FranceTravailClient class for authenticating and interacting with France Travail services.

Classes:

Name Description FranceTravailClient

Primary client for API access with OAuth2 authentication.

Scope

Available API scopes.

Examples:

>>> from france_travail_api.client import FranceTravailClient
>>> from france_travail_api.auth.scope import Scope
>>>
>>> with FranceTravailClient(
...     client_id="your_id",
...     client_secret="your_secret",
...     scopes=[Scope.OFFRES]
... ) as client:
...     pass  # Use client to access API endpoints

docs.title: FranceTravailClient
docs.text:
Client for interacting with the France Travail API.

The FranceTravailClient provides a high-level interface to access France Travail services.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default client_id str

Application identifier provided by France Travail.

required client_secret str

Application secret key provided by France Travail.

required scopes Sequence[Scope]

List of API scopes defining accessible resources. See france_travail_api.Scope for available scopes.

required _http_client HttpClient

Internal HTTP client for making requests. Not intended for direct use.

None

Attributes:

Name Type Description offres FranceTravailOffresClient

Client for accessing job offers.

Notes

The client handles OAuth2 authentication automatically. Access tokens are obtained and refreshed as needed during API calls.

The client should be used as a context manager to ensure proper cleanup of HTTP connections.

Examples:

Initialize and manage the client lifecycle:

>>> from france_travail_api import FranceTravailClient
>>>
>>> with FranceTravailClient(...) as client:
...     job_offers = client.offres.search(mots_cles="développeur Python")
See Also

Scope : Available API scopes FranceTravailOffresClient : Client for accessing job offers

References

[1] France Travail API Documentation https://francetravail.io/data/api

docs.title: close()
docs.text: Close the client and its underlying HTTP client.

docs.title: close_async() async
docs.text: Close the client and its underlying HTTP client asynchronously.

docs.title: Scope
docs.text:
Bases: str, Enum

Available France Travail API scopes.

Attributes:

Name Type Description OFFRES str

Scope for accessing "Offres d'emploi" API.

References

.. [1] France Travail API Documentation https://francetravail.io/data/api

docs.title: get(offer_id)
docs.text:
Get a job offer by its ID.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default offer_id str

Job offer ID (e.g., "048KLTP").

required

Returns:

Type Description Offre

The job offer with the specified ID.

Raises:

Type Description OffreNotFoundException

If no job offer with the specified ID exists.

Examples:

>>> client = FranceTravailOffresClient(credentials, http_client)
>>> client.get(offer_id="048KLTP")
Offre(id="048KLTP", intitule="Développeur Python (H/F)", ...)
References

.. [1] France Travail API Documentation - Offres d'emploi - Consulter un détail d'offre https://francetravail.io/produits-partages/catalogue/offres-emploi/documentation#/api-reference/operations/recupererOffre

docs.title: get_async(offer_id) async
docs.text:
Get a job offer by its ID asynchronously.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default offer_id str

Job offer ID (e.g., "048KLTP").

required

Returns:

Type Description Offre

The job offer with the specified ID.

Raises:

Type Description OffreNotFoundException

If no job offer with the specified ID exists.

Examples:

>>> import asyncio
>>> client = FranceTravailOffresClient(credentials, http_client)
>>> asyncio.run(client.get_async(offer_id="048KLTP"))
Offre(id="048KLTP", intitule="Développeur Python (H/F)", ...)
References

.. [1] France Travail API Documentation - Offres d'emploi - Consulter un détail d'offre https://francetravail.io/produits-partages/catalogue/offres-emploi/documentation#/api-reference/operations/recupererOffre

docs.title: search(mots_cles, sort=None, domaine=None, code_rome=None, appellation=None, theme=None, secteur_activite=None, code_naf=None, experience=None, type_contrat=None, nature_contrat=None, origine_offre=None, qualification=None, temps_plein=None, commune=None, distance=None, departement=None, inclure_limitrophes=None, region=None, pays_continent=None, niveau_formation=None, permis=None, salaire_min=None, periode_salaire=None, acces_travailleur_handicape=None, publiee_depuis=None, min_creation_date=None, max_creation_date=None, offres_mrs=None, experience_exigence=None, grand_domaine=None, partenaires=None, mode_selection_partenaires=None, duree_hebdo_min=None, duree_hebdo_max=None, duree_contrat_min=None, duree_contrat_max=None, duree_hebdo=None, offres_manque_candidats=None, entreprises_adaptees=None, employeurs_handi_engages=None, range_param=None)
docs.text:
Search for job offers.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default mots_cles str

Keywords to search for

required sort Sort

Sorting method (Sort.PERTINENCE, Sort.DATE_CREATION, Sort.DISTANCE)

None domaine str

Job domain code

None code_rome str

ROME code (up to 200 values, comma-separated)

None appellation str

ROME appellation code

None theme str

ROME theme code

None secteur_activite str

Activity sector (NAF division, up to 2 values)

None code_naf str

NAF code (format 99.99X, up to 2 values)

None experience Experience

Experience level (Experience.NON_PRECISE, Experience.MOINS_UN_AN, etc.)

None type_contrat CodeTypeContrat

Contract type (CodeTypeContrat.CDI, CodeTypeContrat.CDD, etc.)

None nature_contrat str

Contract nature code

None origine_offre OrigineOffreFilter

Offer origin filter (OrigineOffreFilter.FRANCE_TRAVAIL, OrigineOffreFilter.PARTENAIRE)

None qualification Qualification

Qualification level (Qualification.NON_CADRE, Qualification.CADRE)

None temps_plein bool

Full-time or part-time

None commune str

INSEE commune code (up to 5 values, comma-separated)

None distance int

Distance radius in km around the commune

None departement str

Department code (up to 5 values, comma-separated)

None inclure_limitrophes bool

Include neighboring departments

None region str

Region code

None pays_continent str

Country or continent code

None niveau_formation str

Education level code

None permis str

Driving license code

None salaire_min str

Minimum salary (requires periode_salaire)

None periode_salaire PeriodeSalaire

Salary period (PeriodeSalaire.MENSUEL, PeriodeSalaire.ANNUEL, etc.)

None acces_travailleur_handicape bool

Accessible to workers with disabilities

None publiee_depuis int

Published within last X days

None min_creation_date str

Minimum creation date (format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z')

None max_creation_date str

Maximum creation date (format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z')

None offres_mrs bool

Only offers with simulation-based recruitment method

None experience_exigence ExperienceExigee

Experience requirement (ExperienceExigee.DEBUTANT_ACCEPTE, etc.)

None grand_domaine str

Major domain code

None partenaires str

Partner codes list

None mode_selection_partenaires ModeSelectionPartenaires

Partner selection mode (ModeSelectionPartenaires.INCLUS, ModeSelectionPartenaires.EXCLU)

None duree_hebdo_min str

Minimum weekly duration (format HHMM)

None duree_hebdo_max str

Maximum weekly duration (format HHMM)

None duree_contrat_min str

Minimum contract duration in months (0-99)

None duree_contrat_max str

Maximum contract duration in months (0-99)

None duree_hebdo DureeHebdo

Weekly duration type (DureeHebdo.NON_PRECISE, DureeHebdo.TEMPS_PLEIN, etc.)

None offres_manque_candidats bool

Filter offers difficult to fill

None entreprises_adaptees bool

Filter adapted companies for workers with disabilities

None employeurs_handi_engages bool

Filter employers committed to hiring workers with disabilities

None range_param str

Pagination range (format: p-d, limited to 150 results)

None

Returns:

Type Description list[Offre]

List of job offers matching the search criteria

Examples:

>>> client = FranceTravailOffresClient(credentials, http_client)
>>> client.search(mots_cles="développeur python", commune="75056", distance=10, type_contrat="CDI")
[Offre(id="201WLXK", intitule="Développeur backend Python/Django (H/F)", ...)]
References

.. [1] France Travail API Documentation - Offres d'emploi - Rechercher des offres https://francetravail.io/produits-partages/catalogue/offres-emploi/documentation#/api-reference/operations/recupererListeOffre

docs.title: search_async(mots_cles, sort=None, domaine=None, code_rome=None, appellation=None, theme=None, secteur_activite=None, code_naf=None, experience=None, type_contrat=None, nature_contrat=None, origine_offre=None, qualification=None, temps_plein=None, commune=None, distance=None, departement=None, inclure_limitrophes=None, region=None, pays_continent=None, niveau_formation=None, permis=None, salaire_min=None, periode_salaire=None, acces_travailleur_handicape=None, publiee_depuis=None, min_creation_date=None, max_creation_date=None, offres_mrs=None, experience_exigence=None, grand_domaine=None, partenaires=None, mode_selection_partenaires=None, duree_hebdo_min=None, duree_hebdo_max=None, duree_contrat_min=None, duree_contrat_max=None, duree_hebdo=None, offres_manque_candidats=None, entreprises_adaptees=None, employeurs_handi_engages=None, range_param=None) async
